paragraphs: <A list of prisoners held in the Blood Pit. The name ""Elegian"" appears near the top of the list, with the notation, ""Confined in the Durance Vile by Special Order, in the southwest section of the prison.""

Near the bottom of the list, under ""Secret Prisoners,"" you notice the name ""Arox the Mutilator."" Beside the name is the notation, ""Gone missing. Or possibly eaten by mortal prisoners. Either way, don't tell Valkynaz Nokvroz."">
